title: Connor Bedard Is the NHL’s Next Big Star. He Just Has to Wait a Year.
description: The most exciting future N.H.L. player attending this week’s draft wasn’t eligible to be selected, but Connor Bedard will be prepared when his time comes.
dc:creator: Gare Joyce
media:credit: Jason Franson/The Canadian Press, via Associated Press
media:description: Connor Bedard is widely seen as the prospective top overall pick in the 2023 N.H.L. draft.
